179a6(mdo 'grel): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid sdug ces bya ba 'am/ mi sdug ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am mi rtag pa'am/ bde ba 'am/ sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag/ 
179a7(mdo 'grel): gam bdag med pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am/ mi sdug par 'gyur ba de bzhin du gzugs de ni med do// gang rtag pa 'am/ mi rtag pa 'am/ bde ba 'am/ sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag gam bdag med pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am mi 
179a8(mdo 'grel): sdug par 'gyur ba de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa de ni med do// de bzhin du gang rtag pa 'am/ mi rtag pa 'am/ bde ba 'am/ sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag gam bdag 
179b1(mdo 'grel): med pa'am/ sdug pa 'am mi sdug par 'gyur ba de bzhin du so so ba dang / bsdus pa'i phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos dang 
179b2(mdo 'grel): 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / 
179b3(mdo 'grel): mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa dang // 
179b4(mdo 'grel): so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar de ni med do zhes bya ba ni gzugs la sogs pa mi rtag pa la sogs pa'i sbyor ba yin no// // bam po sum cu
179b5(mdo 'grel): dgu pa/ rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te gzugs yongs su ma rdzogs pa dang rdzogs pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu 
179b6(mdo 'grel): phyin pa la spyod do// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa yongs su ma rdzogs pa dang rdzogs pa'o zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de bzhin du so so ba dang / 
179b7(mdo 'grel): bsdus pa'i phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i yan lag yongs su ma rdzogs pa dang rdzogs pa'o zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de bzhin du pha rol 
179b8(mdo 'grel): tu phyin pa thams cad dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad yongs su ma rdzogs pa dang rdzogs pa'i zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de 
180a1(mdo 'grel): bzhin du dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / lam rnams 
180a2(mdo 'grel): yongs su ma rdzogs pa dang rdzogs pa'o zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de bzhin du 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i 
180a3(mdo 'grel): snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su
180a4(mdo 'grel): ma rdzogs pa dang rdzogs pa'o zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs 
180a5(mdo 'grel): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su pa rdzogs pa dang rdzogs pa'o zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du yongs su ma rdzogs pa dang rdzogs pa zhes 
180a6(mdo 'grel): bya bar mi spod ngo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzugs yongs su ma rdzogs pa dang rdzogs pa gang yin pa de ni gzugs ma yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba de ltar yang mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu 
180a7(mdo 'grel): phyin pa la spyod do// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa yongs su ma rdzogs pa dang rdzogs pa gang yin pa de rnam par shes pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol 
180a8(mdo 'grel): tu phyin pa la spyod do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du yongs su ma rdzogs pa dang rdzogs pa gang yin pa de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba de ltar yang mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin 
180b1(mdo 'grel): pa la spyod do zhes bya ba ni gzugs la sogs pa ma rdzogs pa dang rdzogs pa'i sbyor ba yon no// // de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de/ 
180b2(mdo 'grel): ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la chags pa dang mi chags pa leg par bstan pa ngo mtshar che'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom 
180b3(mdo 'grel): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la chags pa dang ma chags pa legs par bstan to// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po she 
180b4(mdo 'grel): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe gzugs chags pa dang bcas pa dang / ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes 
180b5(mdo 'grel): pa chags pa dang bcas pa dang / ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// mi chags pa dang bcas pa dang / mchags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de bzhin 
180b6(mdo 'grel): du rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid chags pa dang bcas pa dang ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de bzhin du khams dang / skye mched dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa chags// 
180b7(mdo 'grel): pa dang bcas pa dang / ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa chags pa dang ma 
180b8(mdo 'grel): chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de bzhin du byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / 
181a1(mdo 'grel): gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams chags pa dang bcas pa dang ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med 
181a2(mdo 'grel): pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid thams cad chags pa dang bcas pa dang ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 
181a3(mdo 'grel): 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid chags pa dang bcas 
181a4(mdo 'grel): pa dang ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar spyod na gzugs chags pa dang bcas pa dang ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du 
181a5(mdo 'grel): shes pa med do// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa chags pa dang bcas pa dang ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// de bzhin du phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched dang // 
181a6(mdo 'grel): rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / bsam gtan 
181a7(mdo 'grel): rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo 
181a8(mdo 'grel): rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams chags pa dang bcas pa dang ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid chags pa 
181b1(mdo 'grel): dang bcas pa dang ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub dang / bla na med pa yang/ 
181b2(mdo 'grel): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub chags pa dang bcas pa dang ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do zhes bya ba ni gzugs la sogs pa la chags pa med pa'i sbyor ba yin no// / de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das 
181b3(mdo 'grel): la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan kyang yongs su mi 'grib/ ma bstan kyang yongs su mi 'grib/ bstan kyang yongs su mi 'phel/ ma bstan kyang yongs su mi 'phel/ 
181b4(mdo 'grel): ba ngo mtshar che'o// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan kyang yongs su mi 
181b5(mdo 'grel): 'grib/ ma bstan kyang yang yongs su mi 'grib/ bstan kyang yongs su mi 'phel/ ma bstan kyang yongs su mi 'phel lo// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 
181b6(mdo 'grel): nam 'tsho'i bar du bzhugs shing na mkha'i bsngags pa 'am/ bsngags pa ma yin pa brjod kyang / na mkha' la ni bsngags pa brjod pas yongs su 'phel ba med do// bsngags pa ma yin pa brjod pas yongs su 'grib pa med 
181b7(mdo 'grel): do// na mkha' ni bsngags pa brjod kyang 'phel ba med do// bsngags pa ma yin pa brjod kyang 'grib pa med do zhes bya ba ni gzhan du mi 'gyur ba'i sbyor ba yin no// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu ni bsngags pa 
181b8(mdo 'grel): brjod kyang 'phel ba med do// bsngags pa ma yin pa brjod kyang yongs su 'grib pa med do// bsngags pa brjod kyang chags par 'gyur ba med de// bsngags pa ma yin pa brjod kyang khang khro bar 'gyur ba med do// rab 'byor de bzhin 
182a1(mdo 'grel): du chos rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de bstan kyang de bzhin/ ma bstan kyang de bzhin no'am bya ba ni byed pa po ma yin pa'i sbyor ba yin no// / rab 'byor gyis gsal pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' 
182a2(mdo 'grel): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa na sems zhum pa dang / g.yongs par mi 'gyur ba dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dir brdzun par byed cing blan 
182a3(mdo 'grel): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las rmar mi ldog pa ni dka' ba bgyid pa'o// de ci'i slad du zher/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 
182a4(mdo 'grel): bsgom pa 'ad ra na mkha' bsgom pa'i slad duste/ mamakha' la ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par btags pa ma mchis so// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin par ma mchis so// brtsor 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin par ma mchi'o// 
182a5(mdo 'grel): babazod pa'i pha rol tu phyin par ma mchis so// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin par ma mchis so// sbyir ba'i pha rol tu phyin par btags pa ma mchis so// na mkha' lani gzugs su btags pa ma mtsham sa// tshor bar ma 
182a6(mdo 'grel): mchis so// 'du shes su ma mchis/ 'du byed rnams su ma mchis/ na mkha' la ri rnam par shes par btags pa ma mchis so// ra mkha' la ni nang stong pa nyid du btags pa ma mchis so// phyi stong pa nyid du btags pa 
182a7(mdo 'grel): ma mchis so// byi nang stong pa nyid du btags pa ma mchis so// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du btags pa ma mchis so// na mkha' la ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams su btags pa ma mchis so// na mkha' 
182a8(mdo 'grel): la ni yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / lam rnams su btags pa ma mchis so// nam mkha' la ni 'phags pa'i 
182b1(mdo 'grel): bden pa rnams su btags pa ma mchis so// tshad med pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams su btags pa ma mchis so// na mkha' la ni rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar 
182b2(mdo 'grel): gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgur btags pa ma mchis so// na mkha' la ni stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams su btags pa ma mchis so// na mkha' lan ting nge 
182b3(mdo 'grel): 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams su btags pa ma mchis so// na mkha' la ni zhig nas dang lhag mthong du btags pa ma mchis so// namakha' la ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcur btags pa ma mchis so// 
182b4(mdo 'grel): namakha' la ni mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhir btags pa ma mchis so// namakha' la ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad du btags pa ma mchis so// na mkha' la ni rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 
182b5(mdo 'grel): 'bras bur btags pa ma mchis so// namakha' la ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bur btags pa ma mchis so// namatha' la ni lan cig phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bur btags pa ma mchis so// na mthi la ni dgra bcom 
182b6(mdo 'grel): pa nyid du btags pa ma mchis so// na mkha' la ni rang byang chub tu btags pa ma mchis so// na mkha' la ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu btags pa ma mchis so// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 
182b7(mdo 'grel): 'das gang gis chog 'di 'tshal ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das gang gis tshig 'di dgos pa de dag ni namakha'i don du sbyor bar 'tshal/ bskul bar 'tshal/ khyab pa 
182b8(mdo 'grel): 'tshal ba dag ste/ bcom ldan 'das gang shes sems can rnams kyi srad du ga chabags pa dgan namasa' yongs su dkrol bar 'tsham lo// bcom ldan 'das sems can rnams kyi srad du go chabags pa de dgan gca can pa 
183a1(mdo 'grel): bgos pa lags te/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po na mkha' dang mnyam pa'i chos rnams kyi slad du go cha bgos pa'o zhes bya ba ni ched du bya ba dka' ba'i sbyor ba yin no// // bcom/ 
183a2(mdo 'grel): ldan 'das sems can rnams kyi don du go cha 'tshal ba de dag ni na mkha' bar snang la rtag par 'tshal ba'o zhes bya ba ni sbyor bar dka' ba nyid kyi sbyor ba yin no// / bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen 
183a3(mdo 'grel): po gang sems can rnams kyi slad du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'chal ba de dag ni brtson 'grus chen po thob pa'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das gal te stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi 
183a4(mdo 'grel): khams 'di/ 'di lta ste dper na/ 'dam bu'i tshal lam/ 'od ma'i tshal lam/ bu ram shing gi tshal lam/ 'bras kyi zhing ltar de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis yongs su gang bar gyur pa de bzhin gshegs pa de dag 
183a5(mdo 'grel): gis kyang bskal pa'am/ bskal pa las lhag par chos bstan te/ de bzhin gshegs pa re res sems can chad ma mchis/ grangs ma mchis/ gzhal du ma mchis pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyang bcom ldan 'das sems 
183a6(mdo 'grel): can gyi khams la 'bri ba 'am gang bar btags pa mi gda'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ sems can ma mchis pa'i slad dang / sems can dben pa'i slad du'o// de bzhin du phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re zhing yang 'jig rten gyi khams
183a7(mdo 'grel): gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'di lta ste dper na 'dam bu'i tshal lam/ 'od ma'i tshal lam/ bu ram gi shing tshal lam/ 'bras kyi zhing ltar de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis yongs su gang bar gyur la de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis 
183a8(mdo 'grel): kyang bskal pa'am/ bskal pa las lhag par chos bstan te/ de bzhin gshegs pa re res sems can tshad ma mchis pa/ grangs ma mchis pa/ gzhal du ma mchis pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyang sems can gyi khams 
183b1(mdo 'grel): la 'bri ba'am gang bar btags pa mi gda'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ sems can ma mchis pa'i slad dang / sems can dben pa'i slad du ste/ bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na sems can rnams kyi slad du/ bla na med pa yang/ 
183b2(mdo 'grel): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'tshal ba de dag ni na mkha' yongs su dgrol bar 'tshal ba lags zhes mchi'o zhes bya ba ni las bya dka' ba nyid kyi sbyor ba yin no// // de nas dge slong gzhan/ 
183b3(mdo 'grel): zhig gis 'di snyam du gyur te/ gang la chos gang yang skye ba 'am 'gag pa yang med la/ tshul khrims kyi phung por gdags su yod/ ting nge 'dzin gyi phung por gdags su yod do// shes rab kyi phung por gdags su yod/ rnam par 
183b4(mdo 'grel): grol ba'i phung por gdags su yod/ rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung por gdags su yod/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bur gdags su yod/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bur gdags su yod/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 
183b5(mdo 'grel): 'bras bur gdags su yod/ dgra bcom pa nyid du gdags su yod/ rang byang chub tu gdags su yod/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su gdags su yod/ dkon mchog gsum du 
183b6(mdo 'grel): gdags su yod/ chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar gdags su yod/ chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba gdags su yod pa'i bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phyag 'tshal lo snyam pa dang zhes bya ba ni don yod pa'i sbyor/ 
183b7(mdo 'grel): ba yin no// de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so// btsun pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la
183b8(mdo 'grel): brtson par byed pa zhig yod na de gang la brtson par byed pa yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ ko'u shi ka gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la bslab par bya bar sems pa de dag ni na mkha' la brtson pa'o// 
184a1(mdo 'grel): nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dzin par 'gyur/ 'chang bar 'gyur// 
184a2(mdo 'grel): klog par 'gyur/ kun chub par bgyid par 'gyur/ tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid par 'gyur ba de dag la bcom ldan 'das bdag gis bsrung ba dang / bsrung ba dang / sba ba ji lta ba/ zhig du bgyi/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ ko'u 
184a3(mdo 'grel): shi ka gang khyod kyis gang la bsrung ba dang / bskyang ba dang / sba bar bya ba'i chos de lta bu yang dag par rjes su mthong ngam/ brgya byin gyis smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor bdag gis gang la bsrung ba dang / bsgrub pa dang / spo bar bya ba de lta 
184a4(mdo 'grel): bubu'i chos yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo // rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ ko'u shaM ka gal te rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo ji skad bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas na de nyid de'i bsrung ba dang / bsrung ba dang 
184a5(mdo 'grel): sba bar 'gyur ro// gal te ji skad bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar gyur na de la mi 'am mi ma yin pa glag tshol ba rnams kyis glags rnyed par 'gyur ro// ko'u shi ka byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
184a6(mdo 'grel): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa rnams bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba bar sems pa de dag ni na mkha' la bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba bar sems pa'o// ko'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ khyod kyi sgyu ma dang / smig 
184a7(mdo 'grel): d+hu dang / rmi lam dang / sgra brnyan dang / mig yor dang / gzugs brnyan dang / dri za'i grong khyer rnams la bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba bar nus sam/ brgya byin gyis smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor de ni mi nus so// rab 'byor gyis/ 
184a8(mdo 'grel): smras pa/ ko'u shi ka de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa rnams la bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba bar gang sems pa de ni bsams pa ltar mi 'grub cing dub pa'i skal ba/ 
184b1(mdo 'grel): can du 'gyur ro// kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa la bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba bar nus sam/ brgya byin gyis smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor de ni mi
184b2(mdo 'grel): nus so// rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ ko shi ka de bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa rnams bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba bar gang sems pa de ni bsams pa
184b3(mdo 'grel): ltar mi 'grub cing dub pa'i skal ba can du 'gyur ro// kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ khyod kyis chos kyi dbyings dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / de bzhin nyid dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings la bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang // 
184b4(mdo 'grel): sba bar nus sam/ brgya byin gyis smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor de ni mi nus so// rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ kau shi ka de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa rnams bsrung 
184b5(mdo 'grel): ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba bar gang sems pa ni bsams pa ltar mi 'grub cing dub pa'i skal ba can du 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni gzhan gyi rkyen gyis mi 'gro ba'i sbyor ba yin no// // brgya byin gyis smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor ji tsam 
184b6(mdo 'grel): gyis na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod na chos thams cad rmi lam lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / smig rgyu lta bu dang / sgra brnyar lta bu dang / gzugs brnyan lta bu dang / dri za'i grong 
184b7(mdo 'grel): khyer lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bur chos thams cad yongs su shes par 'gyur ba yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rmi lam rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam gyis rlom sems su// / 
184b8(mdo 'grel): mi byed/ rmi lam la rlom sems su mi byed/ de bzhin du sprul pa'i bar du rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pas rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pa la rlom sems su mi byed pa de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos/ 
185a1(mdo 'grel): thams cad sgyu ma lta bu dang / chos thams cad sprul pa lta bu'i bar du yongs su shes par 'gyur ba yin no zhes bya ba ni rnam pa bdun du snang ba'i shes pa'i sbyor ba yin te/ 'di dag gis ni sbyor ba gsungs so// / 
185a2(mdo 'grel): shi ka gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzugs rlom sems su mi byed/ gzugs kyis rlom sems su mi byed/ gzugs bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed 
185a3(mdo 'grel): gzugs la rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam rlom sems su mi byed/ rmilam gyi rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam la rlom sems su mi byed do// sprul pa'i bar du rlom sems sum 
185a4(mdo 'grel): byed/ sprul pas rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pa bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pa la rlom sems su mi byed do// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa rlom sems su mi byed 
185a5(mdo 'grel): rnam par shes pa bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ rnam par shes pa la rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam gyis rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi 
185a6(mdo 'grel): lam la rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pa'i bar du rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pas rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pa bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pa la rlom sems su mi byed/ de bzhin du so so ba dang 
185a7(mdo 'grel): bsdus pa'i phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i yan lag dang / pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos// / 
185a8(mdo 'grel): sum cu rtsa bdun dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i 
185b1(mdo 'grel): snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs 
185b2(mdo 'grel): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du rlom sems su mi byed/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis rlom sems su mi byed/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bdag gi zhes rlom 
185b3(mdo 'grel): sems su mi byed/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam gyis rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam la rlom 
185b4(mdo 'grel): sems su mi byed/ sprul pa'i bar du rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pas rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pa bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pa la rlom sems su mi byed do zhes bya ba ni sbyor ba'i mnyam pa nyid 
185b5(mdo 'grel): yin no// / de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang / 'thab bral ba rnams dang / dga' ldan pa rnams dang 
185b6(mdo 'grel): 'phrul dga' ba rnams dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed pa rnams dang / tshangs 'khor ba rnams dang / tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don pa rnams dang / tshangs chen pa rnams dang / gnas gtsang ma'i bar gyi ris kyi lha'i bu gang ji snyed cig/ 
185b7(mdo 'grel): yod pa de dag thams cad lha rdzas kyi tsan dan gyi phye mas bcom ldan 'das la mngon par mthor zhing / bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong de lhags nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig 
185b8(mdo 'grel): tu 'khod do// de nas rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi bar gyi lha'i bu rnams kyis sangs rgyas kyi mthus/ sangs rgyas stong gi yi ge 'di nyid dang / ming 'di nyid dang / rab 'byor zhes/ 
186a1(mdo 'grel): bya ba'i dge slong kho nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid yongs su zhu ba byas shing ston par byed pa dang / lha rnams kyi dbang po bcu byin shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid yongs su zhu ba byed cing chos ston 
186a2(mdo 'grel): par mdzad pa sems kyis mthong bar gyur to// de bzhin du shar phyogs dang / lho dang / rub dang / bung dang / steng dang / 'og gi phyogs rnams dang / mtshams rnams thams cad na sangs rgyas stong gi yi ge 'di nyid dang / ming 'di nyid 
186a3(mdo 'grel): dang / rab 'byor zhes bya ba'i dge slong kho nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid zhub byas shing ston par byed pa dang / thams cad du lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid zhub byed cing chos ston pa 
186a4(mdo 'grel): mdzad pa rnams sems kyis mthong bar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa yang sa'i phyogs 'di nyid du bla na med pa 
186a5(mdo 'grel): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid 'chad par 'gyur ro// gang yang bskal pa bzang po 'di la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs 
186a6(mdo 'grel): pa'i sangs rgyas gang 'byung ba de dag kyang sa'i phyogs 'di nyid du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid 'chad par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni 
186a7(mdo 'grel): mthong ba'i lam gyi skad cig ma bcu drug po dpang du gyur pa shes par byed pa yin te/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rnam pa gang dag dang / rtags gang dag dang / mtshan ma gang 
186a8(mdo 'grel): dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid 'chad par 'gyur/ bcom 
186b1(mdo 'grel): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'dir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas gzugs rtag ces bya ba 'am mi
186b2(mdo 'grel): rtag ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// de bzhin du bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya ba 'am/ bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag med ces bya ba 'am/ sdug ces bya ba 'am/ mi sdug ces bya bar chos ston par mi 
186b3(mdo 'grel): 'gyur ro// gzugs bcings zhes bya ba 'am grol zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa rtag ces bya ba 'am/ mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston 
186b4(mdo 'grel): par mi 'gyur ro// de bzhin du bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya ba 'am/ bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag med ces bya ba 'am/ sdug ces bya ba'am/ mi sdug ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// rnam par shes pa 
186b5(mdo 'grel): bcings zhes bya ba 'am/ grol zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// gzugs 'das zhes bya ba 'am/ ma 'ongs pa zhes bya ba 'am/ da ltar byung ba zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 
186b6(mdo 'grel): 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa 'das pa zhes bya ba'am/ ma 'ongs pa zhes bya ba 'am/ da ltar byung ba zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// de bzhin du sos pa dang / sdug pa'i phung po dang 
186b7(mdo 'grel): khams dang / skye mched dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba rnams dang / pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos 
186b8(mdo 'grel): sum cu rtsa bdun dang / 'phags pa'i bde pa rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug 
187a1(mdo 'grel): pa dgu rnams dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa rnams dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / stobs bcu rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams 
187a2(mdo 'grel): dang / sangs rgyas kyi tshes ma 'dres pa rnams dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du 'das pa zhes bya ba dang / ma 'ongs pa zhes bya ba dang / da ltar byung ba zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni sdug bsngal la/ 
187a3(mdo 'grel): chos shes pa'i bzod pa yin no// // de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i 
187a4(mdo 'grel): byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas ji ltar chos ston par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsam pa/ gzugs shin tu rnam par dag go zhes bya bar chos ston par 'gyur ro// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed/ 
187a5(mdo 'grel): rnams dang / rnam par shes pa shin tu rnam par dag go zhes bya bar chos ston par 'gyur ro// de bzhin du phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba rnams dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / stong pa 
187a6(mdo 'grel): nyid rnams dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar 
187a7(mdo 'grel): nam pa mams par 'dun pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa zad pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / stobs pa narnams dang / tsha jigs pa rnams dang / so sa yang dag par dran pa 
187a8(mdo 'grel): rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du shin tu rnam par dag go zhes bya bar chos ston par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni 
187b1(mdo 'grel): sdug bsngal la chos shes pa yin no// // rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni yongs su dag pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor gzugs yongs su dag pa'i 
187b2(mdo 'grel): phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa yongs su dag pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o// de bzhin du phung po dang / 
187b3(mdo 'grel): khams dang / skye mched dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba rnams dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid rnams dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang // 
187b4(mdo 'grel): bsam gtan rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang 
187b5(mdo 'grel): mngon par shes pa rnams dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du yongs su dag pa'i 
187b6(mdo 'grel): sa sa na nga ga // du sa sa sa nas rgyas pa sa 
187b7(mdo 'grel): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/ ji ltar na tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa yongs su dag pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/ de bzhin du phung po 
187b8(mdo 'grel): dang / khams dang / skye mched dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba rnams dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / bsam gtan 
188a1(mdo 'grel): rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa 
188a2(mdo 'grel): med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / stobs bcu rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar 
188a3(mdo 'grel): du yongs su dag pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor gzugs kyi skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang // 
188a4(mdo 'grel): rnam par byang ba med pa ni/ gzugs yongs su dag pa'o// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i skye ba med pa dang / 'gog pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba 
188a5(mdo 'grel): med pa ni rnam par shes pa yongs su dag pa'o// de bzhin du phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i yan lag rnams dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin 
188a6(mdo 'grel): rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad 
188a7(mdo 'grel): dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa
188a8(mdo 'grel): rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 
188b1(mdo 'grel): 'dreb pa bco brgyad yongs su dag pa'o// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su
188b2(mdo 'grel): dag pa'o zhes bya ba ni sdug bsngal la rjes su shes pa yin no// // rab 'byor gzhan yang na mkha' yongs su dag pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar 
188b3(mdo 'grel): na mkha' yongs su dag pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gzugs nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar nan mkha' ltar skye ba med pa dang / 'gag 
188b4(mdo 'grel): pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o zhes bya ba ni kun 'byung la chos shes pa'i bzod pa yin no// rab 'byor na mkha' gos pa med 
188b5(mdo 'grel): pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na nam mkha' gos pa ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/ bcom 
188b6(mdo 'grel): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nam mkha' la gzugs nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du gos pa med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o zhes bya ba ni kun 'byung la chos shes pa yin no// / 
188b7(mdo 'grel): rab 'byor gzhan yang nam mkha' gzung du med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na nam mkha' gzung du ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha 
188b8(mdo 'grel): rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nam mkha' ltar gzugs nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du gzung du med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag 
189a1(mdo 'grel): pa'o zhes bya ba ni kun 'byung la rjes su shes pa'i bzod pa yin no// / gang rab 'byor nam mkha' la tha snyad med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ 
189a2(mdo 'grel): bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na nam mkha' la tha snyad ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha' la brag ca 
189a3(mdo 'grel): gnyis kyi sgra ji lta ba de bzhin du rab 'byor nam mkha' ltar gzugs nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du tha snyad med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o zhes bya ba ni kun 'byung la rjes su 
189a4(mdo 'grel): shes pa yin no// // gang rab 'byor nam mkha' brjod du med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na nam mkha' brjod du ma mchis pa'i 
189a5(mdo 'grel): slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor nam mkha' la ni gang yang brjod du med pa'o// rab 'byor de bzhin du/ gzugs nas rnam pa thams cad 
189a6(mdo 'grel): mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du brjod du med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o zhes bya ba ni 'gog pa la chos shes pa'i bzod pa yin no// / gang nam mkha' dmigs su med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 
189a7(mdo 'grel): yongs su dag pa'o// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na nam mkha' dmigs su ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 
189a8(mdo 'grel): 'byor na mkha' la gang yang dmigs su med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du gzugs nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du dmigs su med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o zhes bya ba ni 'gog 
189b1(mdo 'grel): pal chos shes pa yin no// / rab 'byor chos thams cad skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o// rab 'byor 
189b2(mdo 'grel): gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na chos thams cad skye ba ma mchis pa dang / 'gag pa ma mchis pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa dang / rnam par byang ba ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs 
189b3(mdo 'grel): su dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gzugs nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o zhes bya ba ni 'gog pa la rjes su 
189b4(mdo 'grel): shes pa'i bzod pa yin no// // rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par bgyid pa 
189b5(mdo 'grel): dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid na/ bcom ldan 'das de la mig gi nad 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// rna ba'i nad dang / sA'i nang dang / lce'i nad dang / lus kyi nad dang / yid kyi nad 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// yan lag ma tshang bar mi 'gyur ro// 
189b6(mdo 'grel): lus nas pa dang / 'khogs par mi 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de ni mi bde ba ma spangs par dus byed par mi 'gyur ro// chos mnyan pa'i phyir lha'i bu stong phrag mang po yang de'i slad bzhin 'brang bar 'gyur ro// 
189b7(mdo 'grel): rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang / gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi bar gyi lha rnams kyang slad bzhin du 'brang bar 'gyur ro// gang na chos smra ba'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ston pa der 
189b8(mdo 'grel): yang tshes brgyad dang / bcu bzhi dang / bco lnga dag la lha'i tshogs chen po 'dra bar 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ston pa'i tshe bsod nams mang du 'phel bar 'gyur te/ 
190a1(mdo 'grel): bsod nams tshad ma mchis bgrangs ma mchis pa gzhal du ma mchis pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa mtshungs pa ma mchis pa rab tu 'phel bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin no// 
190a2(mdo 'grel): de de bzhin te/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang tshes brgyad dam/ bcu bzhi dang / bco lnga dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di lha'i 'khor gyi mdun du ston pa de'i bsod nams tshad med pa/ grangs med pa/ gzhal du med pa/ 
190a3(mdo 'grel): bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ mtshungs pa med pa rab tu 'phel bar 'gyur ro// rab 'byor de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rin po che yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni 'gog pa la rjes su shes pa yin no// / 
190a4(mdo 'grel): rab 'byor de la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rin po che chen po 'di ston par gyur na dmyal ba las yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro// byol song gi skye gnas las yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro// gshin rje'i 'jig rten las yongs su 
190a5(mdo 'grel): grol bar 'gyur ro// dbul po las yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro// rgyal rigs sA la chen por skye bar 'gyur ro// bram ze'i rigs sA la chen por skye bar 'gyur ro// khyim bdag gi rigs sA la chen por skye bar 'gyur ro// rgyal chen 
190a6(mdo 'grel): bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams su skye bar byed do// 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi bar gyi lha rnams su skye bar byed do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu sbyin par byed do// lan 
190a7(mdo 'grel): cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar sbyin par byed do// de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 
190a8(mdo 'grel): 'di las dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rgyas par bstan pa'i phyir te/ de la bslabs pas rgyal rigs sA la chen po rnams yod do// bram ze'i rigs sA la chen po rnams yod do// khyim bdag gi rigs sAl chen po rnams yod do// 
190b1(mdo 'grel): rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang / 'thab bral ba rnams dang / dga' ldan pa rnams dang / 'phrul dga' ba rnams dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs 'khor gyi lha
190b2(mdo 'grel): rnams yod do// tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don gyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs chen gyi lha rnams yod do// 'od chung gi lha rnams yod do// tshad med 'od kyi lha rnams yod do// 'od gsal gyi lha rnams yod do// dge chung gi lha rnams yod 
190b3(mdo 'grel): do// tshad med dge ba'i lha rnams yod do// dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do// sprin med kyi lha rnams yod do// bsod nams 'phel gyi lha rnams yod do// 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do// gnas gtsang ma'i lha rnams yod do// 
190b4(mdo 'grel): mi che ba'i lha rnams yod do// mi gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do// rab lta'i lha rnams yod do// legs mthong gi lha rnams yod do// 'og min gyi lha rnams yod do// nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// 
190b5(mdo 'grel): rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// chung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang / lan cig phyir 'ong
190b6(mdo 'grel): ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid yod do// rang byang chub yod do// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yod do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// bsam gtan bzhi rnams 
190b7(mdo 'grel): yod do// tshad med pa bzhi rnams yod do// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi rnams yod do// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod 
190b8(mdo 'grel): do// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// thabs mkhas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// 
191a1(mdo 'grel): stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yod do// yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / 
191a2(mdo 'grel): stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam rnams yod do// nang stong pa nyid yod do// gyi stong pa nyid yod de// byi nang stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po med pa'i ngo ba nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du yod do// 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi 
191a3(mdo 'grel): rnams yod do// rnam par thar pa brgyad rnams yod do// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgra rnams yod do// stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa rnams yod do// mngon par shes pa drug rnams 
191a4(mdo 'grel): yod do// ting nge 'dzin rnams yod do// gzungs kyi rnapas yod do// byang chub sems dpa' ma bcu rnams yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu rnams yod do// mi 'jigs pa bzhi rnams yod do// so so yang dag 
191a5(mdo 'grel): par rig pa bzhi rnams yod do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad rnams yod do// rnam pa thams cad mthun pa nyid kyi bar du yod do// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yod do// dkon mchog gsum 
191a6(mdo 'grel): rnams yod do// sangs rgyas dkon mchog yod do// chos dkon mchog yod do// dge 'dun dkon mchog yod do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las chos de dag thams cad rgya cher bstan to// de bas na 'di lta ste/ shes 
191a7(mdo 'grel): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni pha rol tu phyin pa rin po che zhes brjod do zhes bya ba ni lam la chos shes pa'i bzod pa yin no// / rab 'byor pha rol tu phyin pa rin po che la ni chos gang yang skye ba 'am/ 'gag pa 'am/ kun 
191a8(mdo 'grel): nas nyon mongs pa'am/ rnam par byang ba 'am/ yongs su gzung ba'am/ dor rab med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar skye ba'am/ 'gag pa'am/ kun nas nyon mongs pa'am/ rnam par byang ba'am/ yongs su 
191b1(mdo 'grel): gzung ba 'am/ dor bar bya ba'i chos rnams med do// rab 'byor pha rol tu phyin pa rin po che 'di la ni skye ba 'am/ 'gag pa'am/ dge ba 'am/ mi dge ba 'am/ zag pa dang bcas pa 'am/ zag pa med pa dang / kha na ma tho ba dang/ 
191b2(mdo 'grel): bcas pa'am/ kha na ma tho ba med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa'am/ kun nas nyon mongs pa 'am/ 'jig rten pa 'am/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'am/ 'dus byas sam/ 'dus ma byas kyi chos gang yang med de/ 
191b3(mdo 'grel): rab 'byor rnam grangs des na 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni pha rol tu phyin pa rin po che'o zhes bya ba ni lam la chos shes pa yin no// / rab 'byor 'di la pha rol tu phyin pa rin po che 'di la ni gang gis kyang 
191b4(mdo 'grel): gos pa med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar gang gis gos par 'gyur ba'i chos de dag dmigs su med pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de ci'i phyir zhe na/ pha rol tu phyin pa rin po che 'di ni gos pa med pa'o zhes bya ba ni lam 
191b5(mdo 'grel): la rjes su shes pa'i bzod pa yin no// // rab 'byor gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ de ltar rnam par rtog par mi byed/ de ltar mi dmigs te/ de ltar 
191b6(mdo 'grel): 'phro bar yang mi byed na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mthong ba'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la rim gror bya ba dang / bla mar bya ba dang / bsti stang du bya 
191b7(mdo 'grel): ba dang / mchod par bya ba dang / brjod par bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'grol/ sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyang bar bya ba'i 
191b8(mdo 'grel): phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro'o// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rjes su thob par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni lam la rjes su shes pa yin te/ 'di dag gis ni mthong ba'i lam bstan pa yin no// 
192a1(mdo 'grel): rab 'byor yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni chos gang yang mthong bar byed pa ma yin/ mi mthong bar byed pa ma yin/ ston par byed pa ma yin/ mi ston par byed pa ma yin/ ster bar byed pa ma yin/ 
192a2(mdo 'grel): 'phrog par byed pa pa yin/ skyed par byed pa ma yin/ 'gag par byed pa ma yin/ chad par byed pa ma yin/ rtag par byed pa ma yin/ don gcig pa ma yin/ don sna tshogs pa ma yin/ 'ong bar byed pa ma yin/ 'gro bar byed pa 
192a3(mdo 'grel): ma yin/ kun nas nyon mongs par byed pa ma yin/ rnam par byang bar byed pa ma yin/ 'grib par byed pa ma yin/ 'phel bar byed pa ma yin/ 'das pa ma yin/ ma 'ongs pa ma yin/ da ltar byung bar byed pa ma yin no zhes 
192a4(mdo 'grel): bya ba ni thams cad shes pa nyid kyi dbang du byas pa yongs su rdzogs par bstan pa ste dang po'o// // rab 'byor yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni 'dod pa'i khams las shin tu 'da' bar byed pa 'am/ gnas 
192a5(mdo 'grel): par byed pa ma yin/ gzugs kyi khams las 'das par byed pa'am/ gnas par byed pa ma yin/ gzugs med pa'i khams las 'das par byed pa'am/ gnas par byed pa ma yin/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
192a6(mdo 'grel): ster bar byed pa'am/ 'phrog par byed pa ma yin/ tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'gras dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / smon lam dang / stobs dang / ye shes kyi pha rol tu
192a7(mdo 'grel): phyin pa gter bar byed pa 'am/ 'phrog par byed pa ma yin/ nang stong pa nyid ster bar byed pa ma yin/ 'phrog par byed pa ma yin/ phyi stong pa nyid ster bar byed pa ma yin/ 'phrog par byed pa ma yin/ phyi nang stong pa nyid
192a8(mdo 'grel): stong bar byed pa ma yin/ 'phrog par byed pa ma yin/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar ster bar byed pa'am/ 'brog par byed pa ma yi ni/ tshad med pa dang / bsam gtan dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms
192b1(mdo 'grel): par 'jug pa rnams stong ba 'am/ 'phrog par byed pa ma yin/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad rnams dang / mazar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu rnams dang / stong pa nyid dang / 
192b2(mdo 'grel): mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa rnams ster bar byed pa 'am/ 'phrog par byed pa ma yin/ mngon par shes pa rnams stong bar byed pa 'am/ 'phrog par byed pa ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa bcu ster bar byed pa 
192b3(mdo 'grel): 'am/ 'phrog par byed pa ma yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu steng bar byed pa 'am/ 'phrog par byang ba ma yin/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi rnams ster bar byed pa'am/ 'brog par byed pa ma yin/ de bzhin 
192b4(mdo 'grel): du yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang ba dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam rnams ster bar byed pa 'am/ 'phrog par byed pa ma yin/ stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / 
192b5(mdo 'grel): so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ster bar byed pa'am/ 'phrog par byed pa ma yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad rnams ster bar byed pa'am/ 'phrog par byed pa ma yin/ ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs 
192b6(mdo 'grel): kyi sgo rnams ster bar byed pa'am/ 'phrog par byed pa ma yin/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ster bar byed pa 'am/ 'phrog par byed pa ma yin/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra 
192b7(mdo 'grel): bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ster bar byed pa'am/ 'phrog par byed pa ma yin zhes bya ba ni lam shes pa'i dbang du byas pa yongs su rdzogs par bstan pa ste/ gnyis pa'o// 
192b8(mdo 'grel): babam po bzhi bcu pa/ rab 'byor yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'ang ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams sbyar bar byed pa 'am/ 'phrog par byed pa ma yan/ so so'i skye ba'i chos stong ba'am/ 'phrog par byed pa ma man/ 
193a1(mdo 'grel): nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ster bar byed pa'am/ 'phrog par byed pa ma yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ster bar byed pa'am/ 'phrog par byed pa ma yin/ 'dus byas kyi khams ster bar 
193a2(mdo 'grel): byed pa'am/ 'phrog par byed pa ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams mabyung yang dang / chos rnams kyi chos nyid dang chos kyi dbyings nyid dang / chos spyon 
193a3(mdo 'grel): med pa nyid de dag ni de bzhin du gnas du gnas pa nyid kyi phyir te/ de ni de bzhin gshegs pas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// mngon par rdzogs par thugs su chud do// mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te 
193a4(mdo 'grel): mngon par rdzogs par thugs su chud nas kyang gsung // son to// 'grel to// rnam par 'byed do// gsal bar mdzad do// yang dag par ston te// de nas lha'i bubargya stong phrag mang po steng gi bar snang la 'khod de ga 
193a5(mdo 'grel): pAng nas kyang lha rdzas kyi me tog ut+pal dang / ku mud dang / puN+Da rI ka dang / man dA ra ba rnams 'thor zhing 'di skad kyi tshig brjod par gyur to// kye ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bstan pas lha'i bu stong phrag du ma skye 
193a6(mdo 'grel): ba med pa'i chos la bzod pa skyes par gyur te/ 'dzam bu'i gling du chos kyi 'khor lo lan gnyis pa bskor bar mthong ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa gnas brtan rab 'byor la bka' stsal pa/ rab
193a7(mdo 'grel): 'byor 'di ni chos kyi 'khor lo gnyis su bskor ba yang ma yin/ gcig tu bskor ba yang ma yin te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni chos gar yang 'khor ba 'am mi 'khor bar bya ba'i phyir nye bar gnas pam 
193a8(mdo 'grel): yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di chos gang yang 'khor bar bgyi ba'am/ mi 
193b1(mdo 'grel): 'khor bar bgyi ba'i slad du nye bar mi gnas pa'i dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid de gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i
193b2(mdo 'grel): stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo // de bzhin du bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin 
193b3(mdo 'grel): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo // nang stong pa nyid nang stong nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo // dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyis 
193b4(mdo 'grel): stong ngo // dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo // de bzhin du yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / 
193b5(mdo 'grel): lam rnams lam rnams kyi stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo // tshad med pa dang / bsam gtan dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams tshad med pa dang / bsam gtan dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug 
193b6(mdo 'grel): pa rnams kyi stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo // 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo // rnam par thar pa brgyad rnams rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo // 
193b7(mdo 'grel): mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu rnams mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu rnams kyi stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo // stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa rnams stong pa 
193b8(mdo 'grel): nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo // mngon par shes pa rnams mngon par shes pa rnams kyi stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo // ting nge 'dzin thams cad ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi 
194a1(mdo 'grel): stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo // gzungs kyi sgo rnams gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi stong pa nyid kyis stong 
194a2(mdo 'grel): ngo// mi 'jigs pa bzhi rnams mi 'jigs pa bzhi rnams kyi stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo // so so yang dag par rig pa rnams so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo // sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa 
194a3(mdo 'grel): bco brgyad rnams sangs rgyas kyi tshes ma 'dres pa bco brgyad rnams kyi stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo // rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo // de bzhin du lan cig phyir 
194a4(mdo 'grel): 'ongs pa'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ongs pa'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo // rab 'byor 
194a5(mdo 'grel): gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni pha rol tu phyin pa chen mo'o// chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin yang chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin gyis stong la/ byang chub sems 
194a6(mdo 'grel): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya yang chos gang yang mngon par rdzogs par 
194a7(mdo 'grel): 'tshang rgya ba ma mchis/ chos kyi 'khor lo yang bskor la chos gang yang bskor ba 'am mi bskor ba yang ma mchis te/ de dag gis chos gang yang yongs su mthong ba yang ma mchis yongs su ma mthong ba yang ma mchis so// 
194a8(mdo 'grel): de ci'i slad du zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar gang bskor bar bgyi ba'am/ mi bskor bar bgyi ba'i chos thams cad dmigs su ma mchis pa'i phyir ro// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar chos thams cad shin tu mngon par 
194b1(mdo 'grel): ma grub pa ste/ stong pa nyid bskor bar bgyi ba 'am mi bskor bar bgyi ba ma lags/ mtshan ma ma mchis par bskor bar bgyi ba 'am mi bskor bar bgyi ba ma lags so// smon pa ma mchis pa bskor bar bgyi ba 'am/ mi
194b2(mdo 'grel): bskor bar bgyi ba ma lags so// de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa dang / rab tu gsal bar byas pa dang / brjod pa dang / btags pa dang / rab tu bkod pa dang / rnam par dbye ba dang / rnam par dkrol ba 
194b3(mdo 'grel): dang / mtshon pa dang / yang dag par rab tu gsal bar bgyis pa dang / yang dag par bstan pa 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa yongs su dag pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa de yang sum 
194b4(mdo 'grel): kyang ma bstan/ sum kyang ma bzang / gang sras kyang ma bzung ba de ni sus kyang mngon du ma bgyis so// gang sus kyang mngon du ma bgyis pa de la ni yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba ma mchis te/ chos bstan pa 'di la ni sus 
194b5(mdo 'grel): yang sbyin pa'i gnas su gyur pa ma mchis so zhes bya ba ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi dbang du byas pa yongs su rdzogs par bstan pa ste gsum pa'o// // 'di dag gis ni thams cad shes pa nyid gsungs 
194b6(mdo 'grel): so// 'phags pa bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyan gyi rjes su 'brangs nas dag par btugs pa las/ thams cad shes pas dbang du byas pa 
194b7(mdo 'grel): spyod pa'i khyad par gyi le'u ste gsum pa'o// // de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni ma mchis pa'i
194b8(mdo 'grel): pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor na mkha' med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mnyam 
195a1(mdo 'grel): pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad mi dmigs par mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha// 
195a2(mdo 'grel): rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rnam par dben pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab 
195a3(mdo 'grel): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rdzib ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 
195a4(mdo 'grel): 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni gzhi ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ming dang lus med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom 
195a5(mdo 'grel): ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni nam mkha'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis
195a6(mdo 'grel): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni brjod du ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rnam par rtog pa dang rnam par dpyod pa 
195a7(mdo 'grel): dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni ming ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' 
195a8(mdo 'grel): stsal pa/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin 
195b1(mdo 'grel): pa 'di ni 'gro ba ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad 'gro ba med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab/ 
195b2(mdo 'grel): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mi 'phrog pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad gzung du med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes 
195b3(mdo 'grel): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni zad pa ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad byang zhing zad pa nyid kyi phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta/ 
195b4(mdo 'grel): ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni skye ba ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad skye ba dang 'gag pa med pa nyid kyi phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom 
195b5(mdo 'grel): ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni byed pa po ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byed pa po dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ 
195b6(mdo 'grel): bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni shes pa po ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shes pa po dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis 
195b7(mdo 'grel): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni 'pho ba ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'chi 'pho ba dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro// rab 
195b8(mdo 'grel): 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni 'dul ba ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad 'dul ba med pa nyid kyi 
196a1(mdo 'grel): phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rmi lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rmi lam mthong ba 
196a2(mdo 'grel): dmigs su med pa nid kyi phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni smra brnyan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sgrar brjod pa 
196a3(mdo 'grel): dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mig yor gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gzugs dang 
196a4(mdo 'grel): gzugs brnyan dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni smig d+ha'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rma 
196a5(mdo 'grel): 'bab pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni sgyu ma'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mtshan ma 
196a6(mdo 'grel): dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 
196a7(mdo 'grel): kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun nas nyon mongs pa'i rang bzhin dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di na rnam par byang ba ma mchis 
196a8(mdo 'grel): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nyon mongs pa can gyi sems dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol 
196b1(mdo 'grel): tuphyin pa 'di ni gos pa ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nam mkha' dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes 
196b2(mdo 'grel): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni spros pa ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ spros pa thams cad yang dag par bcom pa nyid kyi phyir ro// rab 'byar gyis ga sol pa/ bcom ldan 
196b3(mdo 'grel): 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rlom sems ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rlom sems thams cad yang dag par bcom pa nyid kyi phyir ro// rab 
196b4(mdo 'grel): 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni me g.yo ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos kyi dbyings gnas pa nyid kyi phyir ro// zhes 
196b5(mdo 'grel): bya ba ni thams cad shes pa nyid kyi rnam pa yin no// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni 'dod chags dang bral ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 
196b6(mdo 'grel): kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'dod chags dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni gnas ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom 
196b7(mdo 'grel): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad rnam par rtog pa med pa nyid kyi phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni zhi ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom 
196b8(mdo 'grel): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad phyin ci ma log par de bzhin du mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa nyid kyi phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni// / 
197a1(mdo 'grel): 'dod chags ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'dod chags dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha/ 
197a2(mdo 'grel): rol tu phyin pa 'di ni zhe sdang ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ zhe sdang yod pa ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu 
197a3(mdo 'grel): phyin pa 'di ni gti mug ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mi shes pa'i mun pa thams cad sel ba nyid kyi phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin/ 
197a4(mdo 'grel): pa 'di ni nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ yongs su rtogs pa med pa nyid kyi phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 
197a5(mdo 'grel): 'di ni sems can ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sems can dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha 
197a6(mdo 'grel): rol tu phyin pa 'di ni tshad ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad kun nas ldang ba med pa nyid kyi phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha 
197a7(mdo 'grel): rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mtha' gnyis su mi 'gyur ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mtha' dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin 
197a8(mdo 'grel): pa'adi ni tha me dad pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad tha dad pa med pa nyid kyi phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mchod 
197b1(mdo 'grel): tu 'dzin pa ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nyan thos kyi sa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'da' bar byed pa nyid kyi phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ 
197b2(mdo 'grel): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rnam par rtog pa ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rnam par rtog pa thams cad dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom 
197b3(mdo 'grel): ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni gzhal bya ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad kyi tshad ma dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro// rab 'byor 
197b4(mdo 'grel): kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni chags pa ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad nam mkha'i rang bzhin dang mnyam pa 
197b5(mdo 'grel): nyid kyi phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mi rtag pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad 'jig pa med pa nyid kyi
197b6(mdo 'grel): phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni sdug bsngal gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad lhag par chags pa med pa nyid 
197b7(mdo 'grel): kyi phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir 
197b8(mdo 'grel): ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni bdag ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad mngon par zhen pa med pa nyid kyi 
198a1(mdo 'grel): phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mtshan nyid ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad mtshan 
198a2(mdo 'grel): ma med pa nyid kyi phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni nang stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nang gi chos dmigs su med pa 
198a3(mdo 'grel): nyid kyi phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni phyi stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ phyi'i chos dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir 
198a4(mdo 'grel): ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni phye nang stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byi nang gi chos dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir 
198a5(mdo 'grel): ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa 
198a6(mdo 'grel): nyid kyi phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni chen po stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chen po stong pa nyid dmigs su 
198a7(mdo 'grel): med pa nyid kyi phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ don dam pa stong pa nyid
198a8(mdo 'grel): dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'dus 
198b1(mdo 'grel): byas stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' 
198b2(mdo 'grel): stsal pa/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// 
198b3(mdo 'grel): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni thog ma dang tha ma med pa 
198b4(mdo 'grel): sto pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol 
198b5(mdo 'grel): tu phyin pa 'di ni dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ 
198b6(mdo 'grel): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'du byas dang 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis 
198b7(mdo 'grel): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir 
198b8(mdo 'grel): ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rang gi mtshan nyid dben pa nyid kyi phyir ro// 
199a1(mdo 'grel): rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dus gsum la dus gsum po dmigs 
199a2(mdo 'grel): su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni dngos po med pa'o ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dngos po 
199a3(mdo 'grel): med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro zhes bya ba ni lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi rnam pa yin no// // rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni dran pa nye bar 
199a4(mdo 'grel): gzhag pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lus dang / tshor ba dang / sems dang / chos dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol 
199a5(mdo 'grel): tu phyin pa 'di ni yang dag par spang ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge ba dang mi dge ba'i chos dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab 
199a6(mdo 'grel): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'dun pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / sems dang / dpyod pa dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom 
199a7(mdo 'grel): ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni dbang po'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dad pa la sogs pa rnams dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom 
199a8(mdo 'grel): ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ stobs lnga dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ 
199b1(mdo 'grel): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni byang chub kyi yan lag gi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di 
199b2(mdo 'grel): lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro zhes bya ba ni thams cad shes pa'i lam la brten// 
199b3(mdo 'grel): pa'i rnam pa yin no// // rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lta bas byas pa'i rnam pa dmigs su 
199b4(mdo 'grel): med pa nyid kyi phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mtshan ma ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rnam par rtog pa dmigs su 
199b5(mdo 'grel): med pa nyid kyi phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni smon pa ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ smon lam dmigs su med pa 
199b6(mdo 'grel): shid kyi phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rnam par thar pa brgyad dmigs
199b7(mdo 'grel): sumed pa nyid kyi phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 
199b8(mdo 'grel): mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni bden pa bzhi'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom 
200a1(mdo 'grel): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sdug bsngal dang kun 'byung ba dang / 'gog pa dang lam dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu 
200a2(mdo 'grel): phyin pa 'di ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ser sna dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 
200a3(mdo 'grel): ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ tshul khrims 'chal pa dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
200a4(mdo 'grel): pa 'di ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gnod sems dmigs su ma mchis pa nyid kyi phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
200a5(mdo 'grel): 'di ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ le lo dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni
